title: 6 Old Judges for Sale 3 Hofers and  3 scarce
author: rhodeskenm

posts.post_title: 6 Old Judges for Sale 3 Hofers and  3 scarce
posts.post_content:
Hi fellow Net54 collectors 

I am putting up the following OJs for sale payment PPFF preferred add 3% for GS and $10 priority shipping. Contact me at [url]rhodeskenm@gmail.com[/url] with further questions 

Hall of Famers
Harry Wright looking right SGC 1.5 off the market 
*Wilbert Robinson catch hands at chest SGC 1.5 $3,100 obo
**Hank O’Day pitch, hands at chest  355-3 SGC5 Sold

*very scarce

**pic available soon

Scarce Cards

James Banning Raw 3 bat on right shoulder reduced to $700 obo
Jack Horner throw ball in rh  SGC 2 Sold
Count Campau Catch Bending SGC 3.5 Sold
Nice group of Old Judges, unfortunately nothing for me.  Not bad prices, would be all over the Campau if with Detroit (KC is actually tougher), rarely see Horner, etc.  Good Luck!

Thanks Joe, coming from you this is high praise.

As you know I am mostly a collector but selling cards occasionally is part of life or as my buddy Bill P polit it family first! I secretly hope a few don’t sell (haha). But the other thing I’ve noted is that we are all just stewards of OJs enjoying them for a while and then passing them on to others. 

Ken
